name: github-security-report
description: Generates a report from GitHub CodeQL and Dependency information

scripts.pre-build-exe: npm run build && ncc build lib/executable.js -o runtime
scripts.build-exe-linux-x64: npm run pre-build-exe && nexe -i runtime/index.js -t linux-x64-12.16.2 -o github-security-report-linux-x64
scripts.build-exe-mac-x64: npm run pre-build-exe && nexe -i runtime/index.js -t mac-x64-12.16.2 -o github-security-report-mac-x64
scripts.build-exe-windows-x64: npm run pre-build-exe && nexe -i runtime/index.js -t windows-x64-12.16.2 -o github-security-report
scripts.postpack: tarball=$(npm list - depth 0 | sed 's/@/-/g; s/ .*/.tgz/g; 1q;'); tar -tf $tarball | sed 's/^package\///' | zip -@r github-security-report-bundle

author: Peter Murray
